statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic_data
SELECT destination_ip, traffic_volume FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT id, source_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.168.%'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp, traffic_volume FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY source_ip, destination_ip DESC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_data WHERE bytes_transferred > 1000;
SELECT destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_ip, protocol FROM traffic_analysis WHERE speed_in_mbps > 50;
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE bytes_transferred > 1000 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, SUM(bytes_transferred) AS total_bytes FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_bytes DESC;
SELECT destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY destination_ip ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, AVG(bytes_transferred) AS avg_bytes FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip ORDER BY avg_bytes DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_location, device_name FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_location ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM network_devices;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_location DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT record_id, timestamp, inbound_traffic, outbound_traffic FROM network_traffic_records WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT username, email FROM network_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY traffic_date ASC;
SELECT network_users.username, network_logs.log_details FROM network_users INNER JOIN network_logs ON network_users.user_id = network_logs.device_id;
SELECT device_name, traffic_date FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP' ORDER BY traffic_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 6;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, unit FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE measurement_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_sent FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 6 AND port = 80;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, location FROM network_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT history_id, date, total_capacity, used_capacity, available_capacity FROM network_capacity_history ORDER BY date ASC;
